attributes.additional_details:
The effect on domestic and wild animals is traumatic. There should also be consideration for veterans suffering with PTSD,  and for people who have suffered traumatic events in their life. 

In addition to this the after effects of the pollution and waste products especially plastic should also be considered.
attributes.background: Make the sale of fire works with noise illegal to sell in the UK. Silent fireworks should be the only type legal in the UK

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:

Ban the sale of all non-silent fireworks: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/649354
